division.name: CERVICAL, THORACIC, LUMBAR AND SACRAL - TRUNK MOTOR NERVES

element.name: thoracic and thoracicoabdominal intercostal nerves, flexors
element.distribution: rectus abdominis; external intercostal muscles; serratus posterior superior muscle
element.action: parietes of the thorax and abdomen; trunk flexor; forced respiration; aid in quiet and forced inhalation

element.name: thoracic intercostal nerves, extensors
element.distribution: semispinalis dorsi (thoracis); transversus thoracis muscle; subcostalis muscle

element.name: thoracicoabdominal intercostal nerves, extensors
element.distribution: internal intercostal muscles, serratus posterior inferior
element.action: aid in forced expiration (quiet expiration is a passive process); rotation and extension of the trunk

element.name: subcostal nerve, motor
element.action: internal oblique muscle and transversus abdominis; forced respiration

element.name: motor nerves of back, flexors
element.distribution: iliocostalis muscle, spinalis muscle, rotatores muscles

element.name: motor nerves of back, extensors
element.distribution: longissimus muscle, multifidus muscle, semispinalis, levatores costarum muscles, interspinales muscles, intertransversarii muscle
